projects.title: PokéGrid Application
projects.description: Made in React, my Pokégrid app allows users to view the Pokémon entries from each of the main-series games. Displaying data on each Pokémon entry and allowing the user to save their favourites for easy access to data.

projects.title: Blog Application
projects.description: Made in PHP, this web application provides functionality to view posts, login/out, write posts to contribute to topics and leave comments on existing posts.

projects.title: Research Paper
projects.description: My research paper about the impact gossip magazines have on the iteration of internalised misogyny - exploring how subliminal messaging is consumed subconciously to spin a narrative of women in gossip media.

projects.title: Bookshelf App
projects.description: Made in React, this is a web application that allows users to view available books, search for books by name, filter books by genre, view claimed books, claim a book, review books and even add new books to the system.

projects.title: Quiz API (Laravel)
projects.description: Made in Laravel this quiz API allows for a teacher to create quizzes to test their students. With functions that allow the teacher to add, edit and delete quizzes, questions and the relevant answers, view all quizzes and/or single quizzes and calculate quiz results from each student.
